about.title: About Me
about.description: I am a Full Stack Web Developer specializing in React.js and Python. With hands-on experience in building and deploying dynamic web applications, I bring strong front-end and back-end skills.
about.description_2: My background in Mechanical Engineering strengthens my problem-solving approach and enhances my ability to design efficient, scalable web solutions.
about.description_3: Based in Dublin, I am fluent in English, Spanish, and Portuguese, with a commitment to contributing to impactful projects within tech-driven environments.

job1.title: Teacher Assistant | Bootcamp Full Stack Developer
job1.description: Co-instructed full-stack development courses covering HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, Python, Flask, and SQLAlchemy. Provided personalized mentoring to help students overcome learning challenges and progress in their training. Developed and delivered lectures on advanced topics, enhancing students understanding and practical application. Collaborated with lead instructors to create an engaging and inclusive learning environment.

job2.title: Full Stack Developer
job2.description: Developing and maintaining a full-stack web platform using Elixir and Phoenix. Implemented new features and optimized backend performance, ensuring smooth real-time interactions. Collaborated with a cross-functional team to improve system scalability and reliability. Worked with PostgreSQL, LiveView, and TailwindCSS to enhance the user experience.

job3.title: Full Stack Developer & Team Lead
job3.description: Led a team in developing an innovative e-commerce platform using React.js and Python/Flask. Key achievements include secure payment processing with Stripe, optimized database design with SQLAlchemy, and agile project management. Awarded Best Project at 4Geeks Academy.

job4.title: Frontend Developer
job4.description: Developed the frontend for YO LO CUIDO, a pet care services platform, using React and modern CSS practices. Collaborated with UX/UI team for design precision and implemented user authentication for enhanced security.

job5.title: R&D&I Project Consultant
job5.description: Analyzed technology projects in IT, video games, and animation. This role sparked my interest in software development and provided insights into advanced technologies and methodologies, fueling my transition to full-stack development.

project1.title: LIQUIBOXES - E-commerce Platform
project1.description: Led the development of LIQUIBOXES, a custom e-commerce platform enhancing inventory management with personalized mystery boxes. Built with React.js, Python/Flask, and PostgreSQL, it features secure payment processing (Stripe), real-time inventory tracking, and CI/CD pipelines with GitHub Actions.

project2.title: YO LO CUIDO - Pet Care Platform
project2.description: Developed YO LO CUIDO, a responsive platform for connecting pet owners with caregivers. Built using React, custom hooks, and Context API, it includes real-time notifications, secure user authentication, and intuitive booking features.

project3.title: Star Wars Database
project3.description: Created an interactive web application displaying Star Wars data using React and Redux. Features include dynamic search, favorites management, and character profiles. Integrated SWAPI REST API and optimized data caching.
